item.description:
(this is copied and pasted from the Melting Pot website)

The Melting Pot is having their annual Purse Exchange
at this month's Girls' Night Out.

Simply bring your purse PLUS two "gently loved"
purses to donate to the Girls' Night Out.

While your 'dueing it up with your friends, we'll
play a fun "what's in your purse" game (with prizes)
and when you're done dipping, you'll be able to
take one bag that is "new to you" from the exchange.
The remaining purses will then be donated to
SuitAbility, a Lowell-based non-profit women's
program created to enhance the marketability of economically challenged women by providing free interview/work clothing to low income women.
Our well-priced Girls' Night menu
(below) is offered every Wednesday.

On November 14, we'll also feature:
 Psychic Medium Marcia Nickerson*

 Palm Reader Roger Lashley*

 Complimentary Tattoos by Musings Henna

 Jewelry by Beadles Bead Shop

* Additional Cost. Advanced Appointments Required

Girls' Night Out Menu

Salad Feature
Choice of Cheese Fondue
Individual Choice of Salad
Choice of Chocolate Fondue
One Drink (See Options)
$25 per Person

Entrée Feature
Choice of Cheese Fondue
Individual Petite Entrée
Teriyaki-marinated Sirloin, Shrimp,
Chicken Breast, Raviolis
Assorted Vegetables & Dipping Sauces
Choice of Chocolate Fondue
One Drink (See Options)
$35 per Person

Drink Options:
Wines by the Glass under $10  Paradise Punch
Love Martini  Sour Apple Martini  Any Bottled Beer
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the front door. I will also have a reservation ahead of time.
item.name: Girl's Night Out & Purse Swap at the Melting Pot
